DOC.brief_summary: MST-997 is a taxane analog with the potential to treat subjects with a variety of tumor types. Preclinical data demonstrated that MST-997 inhibited tumor growth when administered intravenously (IV). This phase 1 dose escalation study is designed to evaluate the safety and tolerability of if IV MST-997 formulated in Polysorbate 80 Diluent can be safely administered on a weekly basis.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating MST-997 in Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis of malignant solid tumor with measurable disease Life expectancy of at least 12 weeks ECOG (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) performance status of 0,1,or 2 Recent major surgery, radiation therapy or anticancer treatment History of any other prior malignancy within last 5 years
